com.example.demo.controllers

Class AuthorController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.demo.controllers.AuthorController

  • @RestController
public class AuthorController
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Sohrab Azami Ghadim AuthorController provides CRUD operations for Author table.

      Author create(@Valid Author author)
      create API creates a new author in the author table annotation PostMapping marks this method as CRUD operation that supports any client like postman, web browser, and mobile device able to call REST controller

    • Method Detail

      • create

        @PostMapping(value="/authors/addAuthor")
public Author create(@Valid @RequestBody
                                                               @Valid Author author)
        create API creates a new author in the author table annotation PostMapping marks this method as CRUD operation that supports any client like postman, web browser, and mobile device able to call REST controller
        Parameters:
        author - : is an input parameter passes entire object in as JSON type
        Returns:
        : It returns an object of type Author

      • read

        @GetMapping(value="/authors/{authorId}")
public Author read(@PathVariable
                                                             int authorId)
        Annotation GetMapping identifies this URL as a GET operation of the CRUD operations read is a CRUD API.
        Parameters:
        authorId - : input parameter of type integer
        Returns:
        : It returns an object of type Author. Entire object will be returned as a JSON type

      • updageAuthorById

        @PutMapping(value="/author/update/{authorId}")
public Author updageAuthorById(@PathVariable
                                                                               int authorId,
                                                                               @RequestBody
                                                                               Author changedAuthor)
        Annotation PutMapping identifies that this api is a update operation of CRUD operations the uri is in the double quotation marks
        Parameters:
        authorId - : input parameter Author id to be update
        changedAuthor - : input parameter of type Author object which is passed as JSON type
        Returns:
        is a object of type Author which the update object of type JSON

      • delete

        @DeleteMapping(value="/authors/delete/{authorId}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> delete(@PathVariable
                                                                                                             int authorId)
        Annotation DeleteMapping idetifies this api as a delete operation of CRUD operations
        Parameters:
        authorId - : input parameter of type int which identifies id of author to be delete
        Returns:
        : returns an ResponsEntity object which is a conmprehensive information about whether delete operation has been successful.
